transaction_date.description: Date for the transactions that were processed at the POS (YYYYMMDDHHMMSS).

transaction_number.description: If sa_system_options, wkstation_tran_append_ind is Y, the first 3 digits indicate the workstation ID and last 7 digits indicate the transaction number.

sub-transaction_type.description: Sub-transaction type. For sale, it can be employee, drive-off, and so on.

orig_tran_no.description: Populated only for post-void transactions. Transaction number for the original transaction that will be cancelled.

orig_reg_no.description: Populated only for post-void transactions. Register number from the original transaction.

reason_code.description: Reason entered by the cashier for some transaction types. Required for Paid In and Paid out transaction types, but can also be used for voids, returns, and so on.

vendor_number.description: Supplier ID for a merchandise vendor paid out transaction

vendor_invoice_number.description: Invoice number for a vendor paid out transaction.

payment_reference_number.description: The reference number of the tender used for a vendor payout. This could be the money order number, check number, and so on.

proof_of_delivery_number.description: Proof of receipt number given by the vendor at the time of delivery. This field is populated for a vendor paid out transaction.

reference_number_1.description: The SA_REFERENCE table defines what this field can contain for each transaction type.

value.description: Transaction value. Populated by the retailer for TOTAL transaction, populated by ReSA for SALE and RETURN transactions.

rounded_amount.description: Total rounded amount, with 4  decimal places.

rounded_off_amount.description: Rounded off amount, with 4  decimal places

transaction_processing_system.description: Contains the ID of the system that processed the transaction.

customer_id.description: The ID number of a customer.

item_status.description: Status of the item within the transaction. Valid values are: 'S' - Sale, 'R' - Return, 'V' - Voided, more options check 'SASI' code type

item_type.description: Identifies what type of item is transmitted. 'ITEM' - normal item, 'NMITEM' - non-merch item, more valules on 'SAIT' code type

item_number_type.description: Identifies the type of item number if the item type is ITEM or REF.

reference_item.description: Identifies the sub-transaction level merchandise item.

department.description: This is filled in by saimptlog.

class.description: Class of item sold or returned. Not required from a retailer. This is filled in by saimptlog.

subclass.description: Subclass of the item sold or returned. Not required from a retailer. This is filled in by saimptlog.

quantity.description: Number of items purchased, with 4 decimal places.

selling_unit_of_measure.description: Unit of measure of the item's quantity. 'EA' - Each

override_reason.description: This column is populated when an item's price has been overridden at the POS to define why it was overridden.

original_unit_retail.description: Value, with 4 decimal places. This column is populated when the item's price was overridden at the POS and the item's original unit retail is known.

taxable_indicator.description: Indicates whether or not item is taxable.

reference_number_5.description: Number associated with a particular item within a transaction, for example, special order number. The sa_reference table defines what this field can contain for each transaction type.

reference_number_6.description: Second generic reference number at the item level.

reference_number_7.description: Third generic reference number at the item level.

reference_number_8.description: Fourth generic reference number at the item level.

item_swiped_ind.description: Indicates if the item was automatically entered into the POS system or if it had to be manually keyed.

return_reason_code.description: Refer to SARR code_type for a list of valid codes. The reason an item was returned.

salesperson.description: The salesperson who sold the item.

drop_ship_ind.description: Refer to YSNO code type for a list of valid codes. Indicates whether the item is part of a drop shipment.

uom_qty.description: Quantity of items purchased in the given UOM, with 4 decimal places.

catchweight_ind.description: Identifies if the item is a catchweight item.

unique_id.description: Unique Identification Number. This field identifies the serial number of the item.

customer_order_date.description: Contains the customer order date. Format is: YYYYMMDDHHMMSS

fulfillment_order_number.description: Contains the order ID of the fulfillment order.

no_inventory_return.description: Indicates if there is an associated inventory with the return transaction with an External Customer Order sales type.

sales_type.description: Indicates if the transaction is an In Store Customer Order, External Customer Order, or Regular Sale.

return_warehouse.description: Contains the ID of the physical warehouse to which the inventory is returned.

return_disposition.description: Contains the return disposition of the returned items.

discount_reference_number.description: Discount reference number associated with the discount type. For example, if the discount type is a promotion, this contains the promotion number.

discount_type.description: The type of discount within a promotion. This allows a retailer to further break down coupon discounts within the In-store promotion, for example.

coupon_number.description: Number of a store coupon used as a discount.

coupon_reference_number.description: Additional information about the coupon, usually contained in a second bar code on the coupon.

quantity.description: The quantity purchased for which the discount is applied, with 4  decimal places.

unit_discount_amount.description: Unit discount amount for this item, with 4  decimal places.

reference_number_13.description: The sa_reference table defines what this field can contain for each transaction type.

reference_number_14.description: Second generic reference number at the discount level.

reference_number_15.description: Third generic reference number at the discount level.

reference_number_16.description: Fourth generic reference number at the discount level.

uom_qty.description: Quantity of items purchased in the given UOM with 4 decimal places.

catchweight_ind.description: Identifies if the item is a catchweight item.

promo_component.description: If the discount is a promotion, this field contains the promotion component value associated with the promotion (discount reference number).

igtax_code.description: IGtax code (tax code/VAT code) to represent whether it is a State, City, or some other tax code/VAT code.

igtax_amount.description: Total igtax amount for this item, with 5  decimal places.

tax_code.description: Tax code (tax code/VAT code) to represent whether it is a State, City, or some other tax code/VAT code.

tax_amount.description: Total rax amount for this item, with 4 decimal places.

payment_amount.description: Deposit amount paid, with 4  decimal places.

tender_amount.description: Amount paid with this tender in the transaction, with 4  decimal places.

cc_auth_no.description: Authorization number for a credit card.

cc_authorization_source.description: Refer to CCAS code_type for as list of valid types.

cc_cardholder_verification.description: Refer to CCVF code_type for as list of valid types.

cc_entry_mode.description: Indicates whether the credit card was swiped, thus automatically entered, or manually keyed.

cc_terminal_id.description: Terminal number from which the transaction was sent.

cc_special_condition.description: Refer to CCSC code_type for as list of valid types.

voucher_no.description: Gift certificate or credit voucher serial number.

coupon_number.description: Number of a manufacturer's coupon used as a tender.

coupon_reference_number.description: Additional information about the coupon, usually contained in a second bar code on the coupon.

identification_method.description: Identification Method (such as a driver's license number or photo credit card).

identification_id.description: Identification ID (license ID or photo card number).

original_currency.description: The original currency with which the customer made the payment.

original_currency_amount.description: Amount paid with this tender in the original currency, with 4  decimal places.

reference_no_9.description: Number associated with a particular transaction type at the tender level. The sa_reference table defines what this field can contain for each transaction type.

reference_no_10.description: Second generic reference number at the tender level.

reference_no_11.description: Third generic reference number at the tender level.

reference_no_12.description: Fourth generic reference number at the tender level.

rtlog_originating_system.description: Identifies the system the RTLOG file originated from. Valid values are OMS and POS.
